Action.author: christopherferris
Action.body: This needs more information - have no idea what this is about.

Action.author: christopherferris
Action.body: ~aambati ~bmos299 this needs more information to make it actionable.

Action.author: aambati
Action.body: I think it is working as it is currently – code is checking if the attribute hf.Revoker is set or not. There is no need to check if the value is true or not. I will close this.
